suppress.notes: Guava temporary file creation is not used in the Sudo Decentralized Identity Relay Sample App.
Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Platform DI Relay Sample App. Set suppression to expire in 2 months. We can re-evaluate and possible move to Kotlin 1.4.0 if it's out of RC by then.
False positive. We're at Kotlin 1.4.30 which is beyond 1.4.21 when fix was available. False positive occurs because the kotlin coroutines libraries are at 1.4.2 and match the broad CPE pattern.
Sudo Platform DI Relay Sample App (nor dependencies) do not use the loadXML() function.
